EmailTemplate.name: DC Breakfast notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Breakfast Workshop for Consultants - Are you able to attend?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
We'd like to notify you of a breakfast workshop for consultants in Tyson’s Corner on March 13th.
It’s called “Same Rain, Bigger Drops” and is based on an extremely popular speech given at Consulting Magazine’s Consulting Summit a few weeks ago.
The breakfast workshop is free, and includes breakfast at the Ritz Carlton. (Well, almost free. To register, you’re asked to donate $30 to Make-A-Wish, which is less than the cost of breakfast at the Ritz!). You can register at this link: http://nynen.com/biggerdrops-va <http://nynen.com/biggerdrops-va>
If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email! ___________________________________ MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6000 e: communications@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
